name: Dimensional Perspectives
description:
Entry for Brackeys Game Jam - 2021.1, 2 players work together to complete a series of open-ended puzzles, comment your time below.

Controls
  • 2D - Up, Down, Left, Right or A, S, D, Space
  • Press E to enter edit mode, or while looking at the TV back into 2D mode
  • 3D-WASD, Space - Move platforms around by pushing them around
Glitches
  • Some of these are known bugs - due to the WebGL port - sorry
  • Graphics bugs - all the graphics got changes when I build the game, and I had limited time to fix them
  • Movement can be glitchy especially with moving the physics objects - while in 2D mode, press R to reset the level
  • One annoying audio bug - only appears in WebGL
